name: Tuna Tuna
description:
This is a game dedicated for my classmate and is a bullet hell shooter. The whole point is to get combos to shoot out supers. 10 direct hits at the boss (without any other bullets not hitting the boss) will give you a super with a lot of damage and will destroy all raindrops on screen. This is a not very polished game sadly because I placed a deadline on myself and because there was school. 

Controls

Arrows or WASD to move and Z to shoot out normal bullets. X to do a super.

Credits:

Programming and (a bit of) Art: Takago

Art and (first time to make) Music: Miyaki
